Package Drawing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VisibleObject
    VisibleObject is the interface for all classes that have to be displayed on screen.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClickBox
    the class clickbox is an abstract class for all the clickboxes. the clickboxes have options to be clickable which means they can execute an command.
    ClickBoxManager
    in the clickboxmanager an arraylist filled with click boxes, we use this arraylist to make the drawing of the boxes easier.
    DrawingUtil
    the DrawingUtil class is used to draw all the actual boxes on the screen. the metods are all discribed below.
    EditBox
    the editbox class lets us put editboxes these are used in the editor state.
    EditBoxManager
    the editboxmanger puts the diffent editboxes in arraylists and enables us to draw the boxes with different textures for example the buttons in the editor state.
    ErrorMessage  
    TextBox
    the textbox class is used to render all the texts used in the menu's and all the other differnt states and gives us the opportunity for instance to change the alignment of each text.
    TextBoxManager
    the textbox manager is used to make it easier to draw menu's in this class we also give functionallity to the menuboxes.
    TextEditBox
    the class texteditbox enables us to let a player type his name in for instance the higscore state.
